channel.title: GitHub Objective-C++ Monthly Trending
channel.description: Monthly Trending of Objective-C++ in GitHub

item.title: yasirkula/UnityNativeGallery
item.description: A native Unity plugin to interact with Gallery/Photos on Android & iOS (save and/or load images/videos)

item.title: sbmpost/AutoRaise
item.description: AutoRaise (and focus) a window when hovering over it with the mouse

item.title: Lessica/TrollRecorder
item.description: (i18n/CLI) Not the first, but the best phone call recorder with TrollStore.

item.title: zoontek/react-native-permissions
item.description: An unified permissions API for React Native on iOS, Android and Windows.

item.title: pocketsvg/PocketSVG
item.description: Easily convert your SVG files into CGPaths, CAShapeLayers, and UIBezierPaths

item.title: facebookarchive/pop
item.description: An extensible iOS and OS X animation library, useful for physics-based interactions.
